TestCaseMetaData.name: M18_Update_Combo
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The Laboratory Test Compendium from Century Hospital Clinical Laboratory is a subset of their Directory of Services. It is based upon the most commonly ordered lab tests by Dr. Radon. This compendium is being used by Dr. Nicholas Radon's practice EHR-S to place orders electronically to Century Hospital's Clinical Laboratory. Century Hospital has made changes to their test compendium: - limited coverage information for the added Lipid Panel - limited coverage information for the added Measured Low density lipoprotein cholesterol, serum (LDL) test - limited coverage information for the deactivated Saint Luis Encephalitis IgG Antibody test and the Arbovirus Panel. Century Hospital's LIS transmits the appropriate eDOS update message to update this information for limited coverage tests in Dr. Radon's EHR.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: EDOS_1.0_1.1-M08_New and EDOS_1.0_2.1-M10_New and EDOS_1.0_3.1-M04_New and EDOS_1.0_4.1-M18_New_Approved and EDOS_1.0_5.1-M18_New_Limited and EDOS_2.4_1.1-M08_Update_Combo and EDOS_2.4_2.1-M10_Update_Combo and EDOS_2.4_3.1-M04_Update_Combo have been completed.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support a M18 limited coverage update message for an added panel, added individual test and a deactivated test.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: Update message to change limited coverage information for orderable tests and panels. This update provides information for the newly added lipid panel, an individual lipid test and deactivates the arbovirus panel.
